task.title: Share an object with another collection
task.shortdesc: CWRC provides the option to have an object available for viewing in more than one collection. This means that users only have to upload an object once.

step.cmd: Hover over the Share tab in the object navigation bar, then click on Share with another collection.
Add the name of the folder in the Share with another collection form.
To apply the permissions of the destination collection to the object, make sure the Update permissions? box is checked.
step.info: If you uncheck the Update permissions? box, only the current permissions will be applied to the object, which might limit its access for members of the destination collection.

step.cmd: To specificly grant permission to view or manage the object, open the Additional Permissions menu and choose who you want to grant viewing or managing access to.
To notify project members that you are sharing this object, check Send notification? and add the name of the user(s) that you would like to inform.
step.info: When you notify users, they will receive a message in their CWRC dashboard.
